content: Here is where you'll need to get your gear together before you go up to the tip of the mountain, where you'll be entering a boss battle against a familiar face.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md", within the section "Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough" and the sub-section "Mei-Jian Peak". The content is presented below:

Here is where you'll need to get your gear together before you go up to the tip of the mountain, where you'll be entering a boss battle against a familiar face.
